title: 求eula通过方式啊！翻了半天mojang协定了
author: Joket_abc

replies.author: 九二酱
replies.txt_content:
标题: 求eula通过方式啊！翻了半天mojang协定了求eula通过方式啊...填成了TRUE还是说我的操作违法啊
我看过好几遍eula协定了..求教通过！

replies.author: 九二酱
replies.txt_content:
小小马 发表于 2016-12-21 19:01
还是说不合法...是第一次

replies.author: lovechina
replies.txt_content:
#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).
#Thu Jul 28 20:36:55 CST 2016
eula=true

replies.author: Rhythm
replies.txt_content: 将eula=后面的改成true就能过了

replies.author: MC小白桑
replies.txt_content: 能截个图看看嘛，既然楼上的方法都不管用
